about_the_game:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Elite Combo Pack. This is a bundle of extra goodies for the people who want to go another extra mile to support Anarchy: Wolf's law

Anarchy: Elite Combo Pack includes the following digital items:
AK12
AK12_308
AK47
AK74M
G36
G36C
Val
SVD
HKSL8
M249
Gaz
Vaz 2101
Vaz2109
Uaz

Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for all your support as we develop the best economical action shooter survival experience for you AWL Team.

name: Anarchy: Elite Combo Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 MB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game Anarchy: Wolf's law on Steam in order to play
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Japanese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
